2020.description: The festival was not held in 2020 due to the global COVID-19 pandemic and resulting health restrictions in Malawi. The decision was made to protect the health and safety of refugees, staff, artists, and attendees. Despite the cancellation, 2020 marked significant international recognition for Tumaini Letu's work.
